name: Junkyard Mage
description:
I would sincerely appreciate feedback on the idea of finding loot and combining it to cast spells.

Download only SS02.rar;

Due to poor Time Management Skills, game is obviously not finished. Expect updates next Month.

WASD =MOVE

Q = lock in items and create new spell effect

E = cast spell

L=  mouse SHOOT

M scroll = scroll through inventory
